title: Illaoi is the only romantic relationship possible for Ahri
body:
Ahri has a bunch of issues because she likes to eat people and is a cannibal but at the same time does not want to eat people because she is a person. She is kind of like a psychopath.

Illaoi is all about chasing your desires regardless of what they are. She is also able to find the desire that people want and help them search for it.

Thus Illaoi would be able to help Ahri then Ahri would fall in love with Illaoi and then that is it. Wukong is literally a boosted animal so Ahri would not want to hang out with Monkey.

So yeah sorry to burst everyone's bubbles not really though because most of you are just shippers that ship stuff and boats.

replies.body: Is it because academy Ahri dresses like a school girl and illaoi has tentacles?

At first it was, kinda like how people were about Vel'Koz and Ahri. Than I had an epiphany. Illaoi's work life is dealing with people who stagnant and got self issues stopping them from moving around. Ahri is stagnating atm (she's looking for some jewelry guy but who cares) so Illaoi x Ahri.
You are just trying to justify your fetishes
I actually don't get off to the tentacle fetish and I also hate cat grils so no. So no.
ahri a "cat" girl? do you not get off to the lore either?
Yes I do not masturbate to league of legends lore.
dude ur weird

Right??!?! 

Did you see last weeks post about Vel'Koz only being able to date Nidalee. Same thing!
they sure are entertaining
don't ruin illaoi for me
Illaoi is polyamory/polygamy so you can still ship her with other people you weirdo.

Lmfao I died laughing. This post is histarically comical. 


"most of you are just shippers that ship stuff and boats." - lmfao


 Your delusionary perception of Ahri is so bad. Sorry not sorry but

Ahri a psychopath? First time I've heard someone refer to her as such. But then again She doesn't rip people apart and eat them...

Nope she just eats their memories from them and they die and she likes doing that cause memories are tasty.

Urgot has this quote "Fear? No. I am the mind killer."

Memory eater -> Memory killer - > Mind killer

http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1061/1924/products/Emoji_Icon_-_Thinking_grande.png?v=1485573434
Urgot=Ahri confirmed.

You realize that if she's able to feel remorse that means that at most she's a sociopath? Psychopaths don't feel remorse.

Would Illaoi even fall for her? Is she even into furries? I mean she is into pirates but we don't know furries.
Ahri isn't a furry, she's a kemonomimi. They're as different as pumpkins and squashes! Don't make that mistake again >_0
Eh, more of a Gumiho really, therefore a furry.
Don't overanalyze the shitpost. That way lies only madness.
I kno, but my brain tells me to go fuck myself and overanalize
Psychopaths can feel remorse.

They can't, and if they 'show' remorse chances are that is fabricated, that's why there's a difference between sociopaths and psychopaths. Sociopaths have learned to ignore such things as social emotions for their own gain, Psychopaths never had them, just learned to emulate them, or as recent studies have signaled, learned to turn on 'the social emotions switch'.
You are taking stuff off the first page of google.

Taken from the DSM-V:

_“Proposed Diagnostic Criteria:
A. Moderate or greater impairment in personality functioning, manifested by characteristic
difficulties in two or more of the following four areas:
[...]
2. 
Self-direction:
Goal setting based on personal gratification; **absence of prosocial
internal standards, associated with failure to conform to lawful or culturally normative ethical behavior.**
3.
Empathy:
**Lack of concern for feelings, needs, or suffering of others; lack of remorse after hurting or mistreating another.**
[...]
B. Six or more of the following seven pathological personality traits:
[...]
2.
Callousness
(an aspect of 
Antagonism ): 
**Lack of concern for feelings or problems of others; lack of guilt or remorse about the negative or harmful effects of one’s actions on others;** aggression; sadism.
[...]”_

_"Specifiers. 
A distinct variant often termed psychopathy(or "primary" psychopathy) is 
marked by a lack of anxiety or fear and by a bold interpersonal style that may mask maladaptive behaviors (e.g., fraudulence). This psychopathic variant is characterized by low levels of anxiousness (Negative Affectivity domain) and withdrawal (Detachment domain) and high levels of attention-seeking (Antagonism domain). High attention seeking and low withdrawal capture the social potency (assertive/dominant) component of psychopathy, whereas low anxiousness captures the stress immunity (emotional stability/resilience) component."_

But yeah, sure, keep telling yourself that.

I will, because what you said before was taken off the first page of google. This is different.

I have no idea where you got this information from in DSM:V. I have no idea what these points are addressing. Checking through some of DSM:V I could not find anything related too. These are broad characteristics that defined pretty much all or most personality disorders.

>Empathy:
**Lack** of concern for feelings, needs, or suffering of others; lack of remorse after hurting or mistreating another.

Firstly it is not entirely proven. Secondly  the words clearly says empathy is lacking; it doesn't say that empathy is non-exsistent. In fact no where does it say that empathy is not present. These semantics be important because in sciences people don't say  "hey you're lacking iron" if you have no iron. They would just say you have no iron. If empathy was always not present they would use a different word than the double word of lacking.

>You realize that if she's able to feel remorse that means that at most she's a sociopath? Psychopaths don't feel remorse.

Also did some more reading and it shows sociopath is nurtured by surroundings into the crazy, psychopath is just straight up crazy. Ahri fits more into psychopath because instinctively and naturally she is a cannibal because she was at first a fox. Ahri also ate a bunch of people without remorse at the beginning.
Wait a second, you haven't read the new Ahri lore have you? She was never a fox now, just raised by them after being abandoned. [Here](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/ahri/)

Not everyone falls for their helper tho, cue in for da "friend zone", or just general friendship. And not like Illaoi would be interested in Ahri anyway. So nah, I don't think it'll work even if that's the only possible ship for Ahri (which it maybe isn't, idk).

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FREL0Bpr,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-08T10:44:22.012+0000)
>
> And not like Illaoi would be interested in Ahri anyway. 

Why not?

> [{quoted}](name=PermabannedGaren,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FREL0Bpr,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-06-09T00:04:24.286+0000)
>
> Why not?

Unless she's bi, otherwise she is straight given her past relationship with GP, hence if the latter is so this wouldn't work from the get go.

And even if we assume she could be bi, given her position and her general personality, it's unlikely she'd be into the Ahri type, or intimate relationship at all at this stage.

Hence the claim.

Illaoi is probably one of the most open charcters in the game. More open than Lux who is just a ball of positivity.

Reason being is because her religion calls for it. In order to fully understand and help people who stagnant she must understand all the different things and is like really wise as such being BI/ being open is very much a possibility.

It's similar to Taric. You can't make the assumption Taric is bi because of how he dresses. You can make the assumption that he is bi because of how he sees beauty in like everything and love and stuff so him being bi makes sense. He naturally has a reason to be possibly bi and Illaoi has a real reason to be bi.
She also keeps going on about "men breaking too easily" and all. She doesn't sound like she would be into other women at all.

Your logic is flawless.
+1

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FREL0Bpr,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-08T05:22:32.569+0000)
>
> So yeah sorry to burst everyone&#039;s bubbles not really though because most of you are just shippers that ship stuff and boats.

Wait wait WAIT!

Do you have a problem with the Mighty Leviatan?

He is the best ship that has ever sailed the seas of Runeterra and EVERYONE in Bilgewater knows that, including Ilaoi. Dont try to even COMPARE him with a lame vastaya that cant shoot cannon barrages from one side of Runeterra to another.

Those landlubbers know nothing about ships.
Boats are stupid. Why stand on a boat when I can just swim?

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FREL0Bpr,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-06-10T00:59:41.603+0000)
>
> Boats are stupid. Why stand on a boat when I can just swim?

Sure, you can swim... BUT WHAT ABOUT SHOOTING CANNON BARRAGES OF DEATH TO YOUR ENEMIES?
Best story to grace this board

Ahri is clearly a Warwick kinda girl.

Illaoi is all about that Vel Koz.
https://media.giphy.com/media/10FHR5A4cXqVrO/200w.gif
Wait what? So she really does eat people? I thought she was just draining the victims' souls out of them and collecting it in her orb...i'm highly disappointed to hear that
So Warwick and Soraka aren't a thing anymore? They had that cute heart exchange and everything....
She will be with Wukong instead.
